InstructionData.Instructions: # Proportional Pump Controller​ # PPC-102​ # Controls up to 5 pumps based on PID value.​ # PID 0-100=1 device, 101=200=2 devices, etc.​ # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library​ ​ alias PID d0​ alias device r0​ alias maxDevices r1​ alias pidout r2​ alias setting r3​ alias t0 r10​ ​ move maxDevices 5​ ​ start:​ l pidout PID Setting​ move device 1​ loop:​ sle t0 device maxDevices​ blez t0 done​ bdns dr0 increment​ updatedevice:​ blez pidout off​ min setting pidout 100​ s dr0 On 1​ s dr0 Setting setting​ j increment​ off:​ s dr0 On 0​ s dr0 Setting 0​ increment:​ sub pidout pidout 100​ add device device 1​ j loop​ done:​ yield​ j start
